translation: Hi, everyone.
transcript: 大家好。

translation: I'm the Shining Girl of ESports Game.
transcript: 我是电竞闪光少女。

translation: While deciding on this topic, I asked my colleagues, "Do you think that I sound shameless with the word 'Shining Girl'?"
transcript: 那在定这个议题的时候呢，我自己在跟我同事交流的时候我说，哎你说我用“闪光少女”这四个字会不会有点厚颜无耻呢？

translation: So I specifically added the word "veteran" in front of the title.
transcript: 所以我特地在我的标题前面加了“资深”两个字。

translation: On the one hand, I'm, in fact, no longer a girl anymore.
transcript: 一来呢是因为，嗯其实我距离一个真正的少女已经有一段距离了。

translation: On the other, it's been almost a decade for me to grow from an ordinary game player, to a practitioner in the industry, and then to an entrepreneur.
transcript: 第二个呢是因为，从一名普通的游戏玩家，到行业从业者，再到创业者，呃这一路走来差不多有十年的时间了。

translation: So it is not too much to call myself a veteran.
transcript: 也算是资深了,对吧。

translation: I remember that when I first entered this industry ten years ago, I went to an esports competition.
transcript: 我记得十年前嗯刚入这行的时候，我去参加一个电子竞技的比赛。

translation: After hosting the event, I came out from the venue.
transcript: 当时主持完那个活动之后，从体育馆出来。

translation: It was very hot.
transcript: 天非常热。

translation: I took a taxi.
transcript: 我打了一辆出租车。

translation: After I got on the taxi, the taxi driver started to chat with me and we talked a lot along the way.
transcript: 一上车之后呢，那个出租车司机就跟我寒暄聊天，啊话特别的多啊，一路聊过去。

translation: In the end he asked me, "So many people crowded together in that gym. Did you have some sort of stars coming?"
transcript: 然后最后他问我说，哎小姑娘那个刚刚体育馆人那么多，你们是去参加什么明星活动啊？

translation: Then I told the driver, "There were no stars. We had an esports competition."
transcript: 然后我就跟那个司机师傅说，我说，啊没有明星，我们是一个电竞的比赛。

translation: Then the driver showed a confused look, suggesting to me that he might not understand what an esports competition was.
transcript: 然后当时那个司机师傅一脸的茫然，让我知道他可能不明白什么是电竞比赛。

translation: So I added right away that it was a type of game.
transcript: 于是我又补充说道，说啊就是一个游戏活动。

translation: Then the driver looked back at me and then said, "I can't tell, really, a young girl like you have such a special hobby."
transcript: 然后当时那个司机回头看了我一眼，然后就对我说，说啊小姑娘真没看出来，你还有这么特殊的爱好。

translation: Then, after that, before I got off the taxi, he said nothing to me.
transcript: 然后就那之后一直到我下车，他再也没有跟我说过第二句话。

translation: I was thinking, "Is it really a special hobby?"
transcript: 我就在想，我的这个爱好真的有这么特殊吗？

translation: In fact, in my memory, many people might not know much about this industry ten years ago.
transcript: 其实仔细回忆一下，在十年前可能很多人不太了解这个行业啊。

translation: At that time, playing games was categorized as things for bad children, along with puppy love and skipping school.
transcript: 那个时候提起“打游戏”，是可以跟“早恋”或者说“逃课”相提并论的，就坏孩子干的事情。

translation: Therefore, society has many misunderstandings and misconceptions about playing games and esports.
transcript: 所以社会呢对于打游戏、电子竞技，有很多很多的曲解和误解。

translation: But to be honest, I have played a lot of games since I was a child, thanks to the trust and support of my parents.
transcript: 但是说句心里话，从小到大呃我打过的游戏非常多，然后这也得益于说我父母对我的信任和支持。

translation: They did not stop me from doing what I liked.
transcript: 他们也并没有阻碍我去选择我自己喜欢玩儿的东西。

translation: However, there are indeed many people who see the behavior of playing games in the wrong way.
transcript: 但是呢，确实有很多的人误解我们这个打游戏这个行为。

translation: Born in 1980s, I feel that the post-80s and the post-90s generation is quite special.
transcript: 我觉得作为一个80后，那我们80后90后这一代，我觉得呢是非常特别的一代。

translation: Because most of us in this generation, as you all know, are the only child of our family.
transcript: 因为我们这一代大多数人大家也都知道是独生子女。

translation: With the improvement of our living conditions since our childhood, people began to move into appartments.
transcript: 而且随着我们的生活条件日益改善，我们从小开始就陆陆续续逐渐进入到了楼房里面去生存。

translation: Living in such an environment made us very lonely.
transcript: 那么这样的一个生存环境呢导致了我们其实非常的孤单。

translation: We either play alone, do homework on our own at home, or during traditional festivals and holidays, we play by ourselves alone or with some adults aside.
transcript: 要么就是自己一个人在家里玩儿、写作业，要么就是在逢年过节的时候，一群大人围着我们为数不多的几个孩子或者一个孩子在那玩儿。

translation: It is hard to understand this feeling of loneliness.
transcript: 真的，这种孤独感是很难体会的。

translation: Or take me for example.
transcript: 但是嗯拿我来举例子吧。

translation: I have many good friends, including my former classmates, my colleagues at work, or the friends with who I cooperate with.
transcript: 我到现在为止，我身边的很多好朋友，除了在我读书时期的同学，再到工作以后认识的同事，或者说有一些合作关系的朋友。

translation: The rest of my friends are mainly friends whom I play games with.
transcript: 那剩下最多的一一块的我的交友圈就来自于我的游戏好友。

translation: We have played a lot of games together and built a deep friendship.
transcript: 我们曾经一起玩过很多个游戏，之后建立起了深厚的友谊。

translation: Many people will say that people who play games are not doing serious business.
transcript: 那很多人会说，说啊打游戏的人都是不务正业。

translation: But what I see is quite the opposite, for many game players that I know, coming from all walks of life, all have a serious job in real life.
transcript: 但是我在他们身上并没有看到不务正业，因为在我身边的很多游戏玩家，他们可能在正常生活中，现实生活中，都有非常正常的工作，从事着各行各业。

translation: However, regarding work, everyone understands that in our real life, we would wear a mask to work and face our own life.
transcript: 但是由于工作的关系，大家也能理解，经常生活中我们会戴着面具去工作，去面对自己的生活。

translation: But once they join the game, each of them lets me see their true side, and lets me see their advantages.
transcript: 但是一旦来到了游戏中，他们每个人，都让我看到了他们最真实的一面，也让我看到了他们身上每个人与众不同的闪光点。

translation: So I think that the people who play games are no different from the others.
transcript: 所以我觉得其实玩游戏的人跟我们正常人是没有任何区别的。

translation: Meanwhile, through this I now come to realize that the largest contribution of playing games or games themselves is to help our generation mingle in the most impossible way.
transcript: 同时我觉得，嗯通过这件事情让我知道了就是，通过打游戏或者说以游戏这个载体吧，对于我们这一代来说它做的最大的贡献就是打破了我们交友的一个次元壁。

translation: Letting two or more people who might never have any contact with one another resonate, befriend and understand each other.
transcript: 让原本可能根本不可能产生联系、不可能产生关联的两个人甚至多个人产生了一定的共鸣，让他们成为了好朋友，互相的了解。

translation: Many people would ask me, "Why are a girl like you are so determined to dedicate yourself into the gaming industry crowded with males?"
transcript: 那很多人都会问我说，哎，你一个女孩子，为什么要铁了心地扎堆在一个男人堆比较多的游这个游戏行业里面去工作？

translation: When I entered the industry ten years ago, I didn’t think much.
transcript: 十年前我进入到这个行业，说句心里话我没有想那么多。

translation: It was really just because I liked to play games, and to host shows.
transcript: 真的只是因为自己喜欢打游戏，然后又比较喜欢节目主持。

translation: So I somehow entered the industry and kept doing what I could offer.
transcript: 所以误打误撞就进入到这个行业里面去，做一点自己力所能及的事情。

translation: But when I really got inside the industry, I found that the industry seemed to be different from what I had assumed before.
transcript: 但是当我真正走到了这个行业里面去的时候，我就会发现说，哎这个行业和我之前所认知的，好像不太一样。

translation: I'll show you one example.
transcript: 我举个例子来说吧。

translation: The first time I commented on a large gaming event, I didn't know how long it would take.
transcript: 比如说我第一次在一个大型赛事上面去做解说，也不知道整个时间会进程多长。

translation: Because our main job, except for commentary, is to make time for the players to debug, that is, to debug the network and machines between games.
transcript: 因为我们解说的主要工作除了要解说比赛以外，就是要在选手调试，就是场与场之间选手会有一个调试网络、调试机器的一个过程时间。

translation: Therefore, we need to keep interacting with the audience, to talk to them about anything that is relevant to the game, or even some latest news of irrelevant players.
transcript: 要在这个时间里面我们要不断地跟观众去互动，跟观众去聊这个比赛相关的，甚至一些无关的一些选手的一些动态。

translation: The purpose is to stall and make room for our upcoming players to debug.
transcript: 那为了就是拖延时间，给选手争取更多的调试的一个空间。

translation: As a result, very "fortunately", during that game I sat there doing the commentary for 18 hours, without eating, drinking or going to the toilet.
transcript: 结果非常幸运的是，那一场比赛我在解说席上整整坐了18个小时，不吃不喝不上厕所。

translation: As I recall now, I don't know how I managed to stick to the end at the time.
transcript: 我现在回忆一下，我都不知道当时是怎么坚持下来的。

translation: But I'm happy to learn that many commenters inside the industry are working as hard as me.
transcript: 但是让我感到欣慰的是，在我们这个行业里，当时有很多很多的解说其实跟我一样努力着。

translation: Every game is a similar experience for them.
transcript: 我们每一场比赛可能都是这样经历着。

translation: Then, with more and more in-depth understanding of the industry, I met more professional teams and some professional players.
transcript: 然后随着对行业越来越深入的了解之后，我认识了更多的职业战队和一些职业选手。

translation: I found that every time when I went out and told others my profession.
transcript: 然后我就会发现说，我每一次出去的时候跟别人聊到我是做这个行业的时候。

translation: From time to time, someone would ask me, "So you are in this industry. I have a relative who likes to play games a lot. Can you introduce him to play professional?"
transcript: 就时不时地会有人问我说，哎呃听说你是做这行的呀，我那个家里有一个亲戚家的小孩儿特别喜欢玩儿游戏，你能不能介绍他去当职业选手啊？

translation: I think people seem to have some misunderstandings about professional players, right?
transcript: 其实我觉得大家是不是对职业选手都有所误解呢？

translation: As for the professional players I know, they are not just good at playing games.
transcript: 就我了解下来的职业选手，就他不只要游戏打得好。

translation: You might not know that those esports players, they are more like athletes.
transcript: 更重要的呢是因为大家可能不了解，就是电竞的选手他可能更像的是一个运动员。

translation: They might spend days and nights practicing one gesture, one movement and in one game or one single practice, they would only use one hero character.
transcript: 他可能为了一个操作，或者说一个动作，他需要反反复复没日没夜地去练习，他可能每一场比赛或者每一次练习他都只能使用这一个英雄。

translation: So it is very boring and tedious.
transcript: 所以其实是非常枯燥的，乏味的。

translation: It is difficult to stick to it.
transcript: 就很难坚持下去。

translation: What's the most important quality that they possess?
transcript: 那这当中离不开的是什么呢？

translation: I think it's the sportsmanship and team coordination, the awareness of teamwork is very important.
transcript: 我觉得是体育精神和他们的团队的一个协调能力，就团队意识非常的重要。

translation: So after I entered the business, I have had a new understanding of this group of people and the esports gamers.
transcript: 所以在我入行以后，我就对这帮人，电竞人，有了新的认识。

translation: However, there are two things that make me cast some deep reflections on this industry.
transcript: 但是呢，当中也有两件事情让我沉下心来去思考这个行业。

translation: The first thing is that when I did commentary on Starcraft ten years ago, Chinese esports didn’t play well in the Starcraft. Exactly how terrible were we?
transcript: 第一件事情呢就是，十年前我是做星际解说的，然后那个时候中国的电子竞技“星际”这个项目能糟糕到什么程度呢？

translation: It was impossible for us to win the Korean players.
transcript: 我们是不可能打赢韩国选手的。

translation: So how far behind were we?
transcript: 那这个差距到底是什么样子的呢？

translation: The most outstanding and top-ranking Starcraft male players in China might be overtaken by amateur female players of South Korea.
transcript: 是说我们中国最厉害的顶尖的星际男选手，可能在打韩国业余的女子职业战队的时候都很乏力。

translation: The gap was frightening.
transcript: 这个差距是非常恐怖的。

translation: The second thing is that there weren't many contests in China, owing to the lack of such atmosphere.
transcript: 第二件事情呢是说，当年在我们国内的比赛其实非常的少。

translation: But in Europe and the United States, in the well-developed regions, in fact, esports games have already become a regular game event.
transcript: 因为没有这个氛围，但是在欧美地区、发达地区，其实电子竞技赛事已经是非常常规的一个比赛项目了。

translation: Our Chinese team made every effort to reach the finalists of some overseas competitions.
transcript: 当时有许多的比赛，我们中国队拼尽全力打入到了入围，入围到那些海外的一些比赛里面去。

translation: However, as the visa applications were denied, they could not participate in those games.
transcript: 但是呢，却因为签证下不来被拒之门外，然后我们是参加不了海外的比赛。

translation: At this time, as someone in the industry, I would be very helpless and depressed to encounter such a thing.
transcript: 每到这个时候，作为一个行业从业者，我就会非常的胸闷，因为我们也很无奈，遇到这样的事情。

translation: So when I was in the industry, I told myself that I hope, as a media practitioner, to speak for the industry.
transcript: 然后在我从业这个行业的时候我就告诉自己说，我希望能够作为一个媒体从业者站在这个行业里面去，为这个行业发声。

translation: I hope that one day I will be able to stand on a bigger stage and let others learn about esports in China and these Chinese professional players.
transcript: 希望有机会有一天能够站在更大的舞台上，让别人了解中国的电子竞技和这些职业选手。

translation: After entering this industry, I am very fortunate that I have met many like-minded friends.
transcript: 在进入了这个行业之后呢，呃非常幸运的是我认识了很多很多志同道合的朋友。

translation: They have worked with me for many years in this industry.
transcript: 然后他们跟我呃一起在这个行业里面工作了很多年。

translation: They also taught me what dreams are, what is persistence, and what is worth fighting for.
transcript: 也是他们教会了我什么是梦想，什么是坚持，什么是值得奋斗的事情。

translation: Later when I planned to start my own business, without hesitation, I chose to dedicate myself to the media industry that is relevant to esports but hardly lucrative.
transcript: 所以在后来我自己出来创业的时候，我就毅然决然地继续选择了做电竞游戏相关的不赚钱的这个媒体行业，是。

translation: But it was hard to be an esports game media at that time.
transcript: 但那个年代里面，其实嗯做电竞媒体非常的苦啊。

translation: We're those who have went through the cold winter of Chinese esports and the content creation industry.
transcript: 我们也算是熬过了中国电子竞技的三九严寒，也经历过中国内容创业的萧条岁月。

translation: Last year, we suddenly came to the realization that the conten creation in China was thriving.
transcript: 在去年的时候我们意识到说，哎中国的文创行业前所未有地惊起来了。

translation: Last year, we started a new business, devoting ourselves to content related to esports games, mainly in the form of short videos.
transcript: 那在去年的时候我们也是重新二次创业，致力于做一些电竞游戏相关的一些内容，主要是以短视频为主。

translation: Over the past few years, the e-sports game content was really terrible and with only a small group of followers, it didn’t receive much attention and thus encountered difficulties in monetization.
transcript: 在嗯过去的几年里面，中国的内容电子竞技真的是比较的差，因为小众，然后呃不受到重视，所以商业化变现也非常的难。

translation: Back then, two things left a huge impact on the industry.
transcript: 然后在那个时候呢有两件事情其实对这个行业的影响非常的大。

translation: The first thing was the emergence of Riot Games, or shortened as LOL.
transcript: 第一件事情是英雄联盟撸啊撸的出现。

translation: This game has introduced many online games, especially e-sports game, to the public.
transcript: 那么这款产品的出现，让很多网络游戏或者大众认识到了电子竞技赛事是什么。

translation: The number of audiences who were watching the final of LOL surpassed 100 million.
transcript: 英雄联盟的总决赛的观看人数它是破亿了。

translation: What does it mean?
transcript: 那么它破亿是什么概念呢？

translation: Here is a comparison we could do.
transcript: 我们可以对比一下。

translation: The number of audiences watching the final of NBA is around 30 MN.
transcript: 就是呃在美国的NBA的比赛当中，呃大概的总决赛的观众人数大概是在3000万左右。

translation: But the most recent match of LOL, the League of Legends 2017 World Championship, had an audience of 140 millions.
transcript: 但是英雄联盟的S7，就最近的那一次比赛当中，它是达到了1.4亿。

translation: We could see that more and more people began to pay attention to esports game.
transcript: 那我们也能看到电子竞技被越来越多的人关注了。

translation: The second thing, let me do a little survey here.
transcript: 那第二件事情呢就是，这个我要做一小调查。

translation: Those of you sitting here have heard of or even played the game named Honor of Kings, please raise up your hands.
transcript: 现场，那有多少人知道或者玩过王者荣耀这款产品的，可以举手让我看一下吗？

translation: A lot of you have, right?
transcript: 还是挺多的，对吧！

translation: This game, quite different from LOL, has enabled more people to experience the fun of esports game, making it a nationally well-received product.
transcript: 那我想说的是这款产品呢，它跟英雄联盟不一样，它让更多更多的大众也体验到了电子竞技的一个乐趣，让它成为了一款国民级的产品。

translation: Besides, it has also developed lots of female users.
transcript: 同时呢它帮将更多的女性用户带入到了我们这个行业当中来。

translation: I can give you one example.
transcript: 我可以举个例子。

translation: When we were managing our sina microblog 10 years ago.
transcript: 在十年前我们做新浪微博的时候。

translation: We saw some back-end followers-related data from either the players or influencers in the industry that suggested the male and female followers' ratio was around 1:10.
transcript: 那个时候我们看一下电子竞技选手或者电子竞技的一些红人那后台的粉丝数据，可以看到的是男女比例差不多在1:10。

translation: That is for 10 male followers, there would be a female fan.
transcript: 十个男生有一个女粉。

translation: If we check the similar figures of Honor of Kings, the ratio of female followers has grown up to almost 50%.
transcript: 然后现在的话，我们再去看一下我们做过一年多王者荣耀的一些红人它的粉丝后台数据，基本上女生已经占了50%左右。

translation: What have female followers brought to the industry?
transcript: 那么女性用户带来的是什么呢？

translation: Compared to their male counterparts, female users have stronger demand for communication, conversation and content.
transcript: 这些女性用户相对于男性用户来说，她对呃交流、沟通以及内容的诉求会更加的强烈，对。

translation: With the female users, then we discovered a window of opportunity in short videos.
transcript: 然后有了她们的出现之后，那我们就发现说，哎在短视频内容这块会有一个缺口出来了。

translation: Meanwhile, some phenomenal short video products began to arise last year, the time spent of users on short video apps has quadrupled during the past one year.
transcript: 同时的话，伴随着嗯在去年开始的一个短视频的一些现象级的一些产品出现，我们发现短视频的用户使用时长在去年一年里就增长了四倍。

translation: So we believe it would be a fantastic opportunity for us.
transcript: 所以我们觉得这对于我们来说是一个比较好的机会。

translation: And last but not least, I want to share with something that has left me with quite deep reflection over the conversation with one of my friends not long ago.
transcript: 然后最后呢我要说的是嗯其实前段时间跟一个朋友聊天的时候，我其实感触挺深的。

translation: We've known each other for a dozen of years.
transcript: 就我认识他十几年了。

translation: As we're both busy, we don't get to see each other very often.
transcript: 但是平常因为工作都很忙，见的机会也很少。

translation: So when we met last time, he told me that even though we hadn't got together for a long time, he often saw my videos.
transcript: 然后聊天的时候他就问我说，他说他见我很少，但是经常会看我的视频。

translation: And every time he saw my videos, he would wonder why I could be so passionate about my career and how much dopamine it would take for me to continue doing this one thing for so many years.
transcript: 然后每次看到视频里都会想说，哎这个小姑娘怎么那么有热情对于这件事情，她到底是分泌了多少多巴胺能让她这么持续地做这么同样一件事情做这么多年？

translation: I put it simply, out of interest.
transcript: 我就告诉他两个字，因为兴趣。

translation: Some people might jump out and question, saying that they think if you have turned your personal interests into a job, it is no longer a personal interest.
transcript: 但是又有朋友出来质疑啦，说我们觉得如果当你把兴趣变为了一项工作之后，可能你的兴趣就不再是你的兴趣了。

translation: Because they think job is rather repetitive.
transcript: 因为工作毕竟是相对来说比较重复的。

translation: I also mulled over this question as a matter of fact.
transcript: 这个问题其实我也仔细思考过。

translation: But there are several things I remember deeply.
transcript: 但是有几件事情，让我印象非常深刻。

translation: I remember back in 2008 when Beijing Olympic Games were hosted, I was still a commenter for esports games.
transcript: 嗯我记得2008年的时候，那个时候北京奥运会，那个时候我还是一名电子竞技的主持解说。

translation: We were notified that it was likely the Olympic Committee would add esports game as an competition event.
transcript: 我们收到通知说，可能在那一年里面奥运会会把电子竞技项目加入进去。

translation: If they did, we would be able to host and comment right at the spot and even report the games.
transcript: 我们有机会到现场去做主持和解说，甚至报道。

translation: We were so thrilled at the news, so we did a lot of preparatory work.
transcript: 当时我们非常非常的兴奋开心啊，我们也做了很多的准备功课。

translation: We knew that only when esports games were placed in an international and professional playing field.
transcript: 我们知道，只有当电子竞技它能够真正地站在这样一个国际化的、专业的体育赛事舞台上。

translation: Would it be more recognized by the society and could it be ever better.
transcript: 它能够它才能够被更多的社会上的人去认可它，然后才能有这个行业才能变得更好。

translation: So we were thrilled back then.
transcript: 所以当时非常的兴奋。

translation: But, pitifully, this wish from ten years ago has not been realized due to various reasons.
transcript: 但是非常可惜的是十年前这个心愿，最终还是因为各种各样的原因没有实现。

translation: At the end of 2017, almost 2018, the Jakarta Asian Games officially included esports game as one of its events.
transcript: 然后在17年底，2018年的时候，我们知道雅加达的亚运会，它正式宣布把电子竞技项目加入到了现场的比赛当中去。

translation: Then I noticed that my friends on Wechat who had been or still were in the esports industry reposted this exciting news unanimously.
transcript: 这个时候我就会发现，我的朋友圈里有有一些曾经的电子竞技工作者、从业者，包括现在还在的这些人，我们不约而同地转发了这个激动人心的消息。

translation: Seeing this, I realized that the people who have chosen to leave or stay in the industry are all very  passionate towards it.
transcript: 我会看到说，无论他是离开了还是在这里，但是我们对这个行业，都是非常有热血，非常有激情的。

translation: I think there is a shared feeling.
transcript: 大家可能会有一个感触。

translation: If you are just like me, a loyal player of World of Warcraft, you would feel excited to see the trailer of its lastest version.
transcript: 如果你是跟我一样，多年的魔兽世界的玩家，当你每一次看到魔兽世界的新版本预告片的时候。

translation: If you are a veteran of LOL, you would feel thrilled seeing RNG win the world championship led by UZI this year.
transcript: 如果你是一位撸啊撸英雄联盟的资深玩家，在今年上半年的时候你看到UZI小狗带领RNG夺得世界赛冠军的时候。

translation: If you are crazy for PUBG, you would be touched by the picture of OMG waving our national flag in your Wechat moments.
transcript: 如果你是一位吃鸡发烧友，那你看到OMG手举着五星红旗刷爆你的朋友圈的时候。

translation: If you are just a esports player like me, I imagine you would share the same excitement of mine when seeing the Chinese team holding our flag and the medals in the Jakata Asia Games.
transcript: 如果你是一名中国的电子竞技爱好者，跟我一样，看到雅加达奥亚运会上中国队高举五星红旗和奖牌的时候，我相信你们的内心跟我是一样激动的。

translation: Those who now work in this industry are particularly proud of it.
transcript: 特别是我们这些行业从业者，其实为我们从事着这个行业感到无比的骄傲和自豪。

translation: At moment of this, I always feel that no matter how old I become, my passion and enthusiasm towards this industry will never die out.
transcript: 那每当这个时候，我都会感到，无论我的年龄怎样增长，我们对于这个行业的热情、热血是没有改变的。

translation: Only when you keep that passion to yourself could you avoid turning into someone you hated as a child.
transcript: 只有保持热血，才不会变成小时候讨厌的样子。

translation: It is the same case with our industry.
transcript: 那我们的这个行业也是这个样子的。

translation: We have been persistently doing what we feel passionate about and what is right to do.
transcript: 我们一直都在坚持做我们觉得热血和觉得正确的事情。

translation: I never worry that one day my interest would vanish because it's always there.
transcript: 所以我不用担心我的兴趣会没有，因为它一直就在那里。

translation: It has been so many years for me, growing from a general player to a practitioner in the industry, to an entrepreneur.
transcript: 嗯这么多年过去了，从一个普通的玩家到行业从业者、创业者。

translation: We have also witnessed the industry from being underappreciated to now well-received.
transcript: 从这个行业它不被理解到备受瞩目，其实一漏一路走来。

translation: These years are full of hardships.
transcript: 真的充满了很多的艰辛。

translation: At the most difficult time, we made huge endeavors.
transcript: 在这个行业最困难的时候，我们做了很多很多的努力。

translation: Sometimes when people couldn't see the silver linings, they chose to leave.
transcript: 但是在那个时候，常常看不到一丝丝的希望，因此有许多的人选择了离开我们这个行业。

translation: I have also asked myself time and time again, "Why would I persist?"
transcript: 而我其实也不止一次地问过我自己说，我为什么要坚持下去。

translation: My answer is ever since my graduation from college, or to be more precise, prior to my graduation, everything that I have now is given by esports game.
transcript: 但是我得到的答案是，其实从我毕业以来，甚至在毕业之前吧，我的所有的一切都是电竞和游戏赋予我的。

translation: There is no reason for me to leave it.
transcript: 所以我根本就没有离开的理由。

translation: Or in a joking way, what is the difference between me and a loser if I abandon my own dream?
transcript: 换一句玩笑话说，就是如果我连梦想都能放弃的话，那我跟咸鱼又有什么区别呢？

translation: That's the reason why I would persist.
transcript: 所以我选择一直坚持下去。

translation: Now I've seen more and more excellent people rushing into our industry and this industry overall is more and more recognized by the general public.
transcript: 然而现在，我看到了越来越多的优秀的行业从业者来到了我们这个行业，社会上很多的大众对我们这个行业得到了很多的认可。

translation: I'm convinced that Chinese esports would one day become one of the most popular sports events for young people.
transcript: 那我相信中国的电子竞技，在未来一定会成为年轻人最热衷的一项体育赛事。

translation: E-sports games would also become one type of entertainment for people and one of the most important ways for people to socialize in the future.
transcript: 而电竞游戏，也终将会成为人们最好的一种生活娱乐的选择方式以及最重要的一种社交方式之一。

translation: So we will stay in this industry to create more high quality short videos to ensure that this industry thrives.
transcript: 我们会一直陪伴着这个行业，来打造和生产出更多优质的短视频内容，来服务于这个行业。

translation: That's what I want to share with you today.
transcript: 这就是我今天要讲的。

translation: Thank you very much!
transcript: 感谢大家！
